forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly cloudy, with a low around 56. West southwest wind around 7 mph.

forecast.name: Friday
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly sunny, with a high near 67. West southwest wind 5 to 14 mph, with gusts as high as 21 mph.

weather_report:
As the evening deepens over Downtown San Francisco, a gentle embrace of partially veiled skies settles in, with temperatures dipping to a refreshing 56 degrees. A light breeze from the west-southwest whispers through the streets, its whispers hinting at the freshness of the ocean air. The golden hues of the day fade into a calm twilight, promising a restful night to come.

Looking ahead to Friday, the forecast anticipates a transformation, as the sun rises to unveil mostly sunny skies, inviting all to revel in a pleasant warmth that will warm the day to around 67 degrees. With a soft wind embellishing the climate, reaching up to 14 mph with playful gusts, the day holds an unmistakable allure for outdoor endeavors. Whether strolling along the Embarcadero, sipping coffee al fresco with a view of the Bay, or losing oneself in the artistic corners of the Mission District, the setting encourages exploration. A light jacket would be prudent for the cooler early hours, transitioning to a simple shirt as the warmth grips the city. As evening beckons, consider an outing to one of the city’s quaint restaurants, where the melding of flavors and good company adds warmth to the cool San Francisco night.
